column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Didn't try the table's mac n cheese
column5: nor the paella/rice dish but the goat cheese was the group favorite among those. The calamari was good
column6: but I would probably try the scallops in place of it next time. The spicy potatoes came with a delicious sherry aioli and a tomato aioli. I would have eaten the aioli with a spoon rather than let it go to waste b/c it was so good
column7: but I was too full. Onto Dessert!
